column2: I haven't had any work suitable to a witcher in some time, maybe it's time to move on.
I should ask [Liege.GetTitledFirstName] first.
[From.GetFullName], a witcher in your employment has expressed his desire to leave your court.
He can surely stay for a while longer.
Some gold will change his mind.
He can leave if he wishes to.
[liege.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to reconsider and stay for a while longer.
Very well, I can stay for a bit.
I have already decided to leave.
[liege.GetTitledFirstName] have offered me a considerable sum of gold if I continue to provide my services as a witcher.
It's not like I wanted to leave.
Few coins will not change my mind.
I will leave to...
... neighbor province with monster problems.
... random neighbor province where I haven't visited recently.
... random neighbor province.
... the court of a ruler who invited me.
[From.GetFullName] will stay in your court for a while longer.
Gold can change any man's mind, [From.GetFullName] accepted your gift and will stayin your court for a while longer.
[From.GetFullName] has left your court to seek employment elsewhere.
A witcher has arrived in your court offering his services.
Very well.
I have no need for witcher.
The currently living witchers are...
OK
§Y[From.GetFullName]§! has hunted down monsters inhabiting §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Invite a witcher
You have a job that witcher could help with.
List witchers
All witchers currently alive will be listed.
